description:
Bring stunning high definition video direct to your Touchpad with Rev3 for webOS. Using this app you can browse the latest and greatest offerings from the online TV studio Revision3. Why not geek out with Diggnation, Tekzilla or GeekBeat.tv, or relax with Film State or Scam School? 
Now, you can easily stream or download full length videos direct to your Touchpad on demand, all in beautiful high definition video.

Rev3 for webOS allows you full access to the latest Revision3 shows, along with access to the complete show library. Choose from all the current show selection including Film Riot, Lifehacker, Hak5, Scientific Tuesdays, Unboxing Porn and a whole lot more. Revision3's current list of shows has got something for everyone. Whether you like technology or music, freaky websites or comic books, movies or video games, you're bound to find a show to enjoy.
